DocAttribute.Name: Position
DocAttribute.Documentation: Definition of the position coordinate system for the bounding polyline ~~and the base surface~~.

DocAttribute.Name: PolygonalBoundary

DocWhereRule.Name: BoundaryDim
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The bounding polyline should have the dimensionality of 2.

DocWhereRule.Name: BoundaryType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Only bounded curves of type _IfcCompositeCurve_, or _IfcPolyline_ are valid boundaries.
